UK Pension Transfer Enquiry

1/3

We’d like to ask a few quick questions to establish whether you’re eligible for a pension transfer.

Thank you and welcome!

You’re the right age to make a Pension transfer, so we’re glad you’re making a step in the right direction.

Whilst you’re eligible it’s important to understand if a transfer if appropriate for you. Our complimentary report will provide the answer.

Not ready just yet? Click one of the below

Thank you!

Currently, you must be over 55 in order to be eligible to make a Pension transfer to an Australian Super Fund.

There is however a lot that can be done that can prepare you for this. What would you like to do?

  • Speak to a specialist
  • Download our Pension Transfer Guide (PDF)
